title: Krome Studios: Screen Worlds Spotlight interview

video_links.name: Krome Studios: Screen Worlds Spotlight interview

brief_description: An interview with Krome Studios for Screen Worlds at ACMI. Krome Studios is a video game development studio most well known for their “Ty the Tasmanian Tiger” games.
